games.title: Playground Man! Ragdoll Show!
games.description:
üåü Welcome to the world of destruction and puzzles with ragdoll physics, where the wooden stickman is already waiting for your help! Immerse yourself in a physical playground full of destruction and relax, solving interesting puzzles.

A great free game for all fans of physics puzzles and ragdoll simulators. If you are a fan of such legendary games as Ragdoll Break: Let''s destroy! and Kick Master, then you have come to the right place. Here you will find many exciting adventures with a ragdoll stickman!

üî• Game features:
- Exciting levels with a variety of tasks that require creative solutions
- Funny ragdoll physics of destruction and interaction with objects of the world
- Compete in global leaderboards: show your best results and defeat other players.
- Play online from any device. Enjoy destruction on your smartphone or PC at any time.

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Support us by leaving a short review. Your opinion will help us improve the game!
games.howToPlayText:
Looking for a relaxing casual 3D game with ragdoll physics? Solve puzzles and unlock new levels. 

üéØYour task: solve puzzles by controlling a stickman or other objects on the level.

üïπÔ∏èTo control, simply move your finger across the screen on a mobile phone or use the mouse with the left mouse button held down on a PC

games.title: Sprunki Sandbox: Ragdoll Playground Mode
games.description: Unleash chaos in this 2D ragdoll sandbox! Control Sprunki, destroy everything, and enjoy epic physics. Build, fight, and experiment with a vast arsenal‚Äîswords, guns, rockets, and more! Create traps, arenas, and battles. Your world, your rules‚Äîplay now!
games.howToPlayText:
Welcome to the 2D ragdoll sandbox. Control sprunki and cause real chaos! üî•üí£

üí• Destruction without borders - explode, smash, break and watch the epic ragdoll physics!

‚öîÔ∏è Sprunki fights - arm characters and arrange epic battles with different types of weapons! üó°Ô∏èüî´

üõ†Ô∏è Construction - build structures, create traps and build your own arenas! üèóÔ∏è

üî´ A huge arsenal - from swords and pistols to rocket launchers and lasers - choose your weapon! üéØ

üéÆ Freedom of action - your world, your rules! Create, experiment, destroy, have fun! üåÄ

Cool mechanics - waiting for you here, build, fight and experiment! Are you ready to dive into chaos, destruction and creativity? Then waiting for you! üöÄüî•

Left-click on the desired item or character. Then drag or click on the game field to make it appear.
Left-click on the item to open the action menu.
Use the wheel to change the scale.

games.title: Car Smash Simulator: Crash & Tune
games.description:
Welcome to the ultimate car crash simulator!

Smash, crash, and customize your vehicles in a giant open-world sandbox. Experience realistic damage - watch doors fly off, hoods crumple, and wheels pop off in brutal crashes.

Drive through zones packed with destruction tools:
- Giant hammers
- Hydraulic crushers
- Mega ramps and more

Discover new cars roaming the world and make each one yours with tuning:
- Change full body color or individual parts
- Adjust wheel size, height, and camber
- Style your ride your way

Whether you're here to break stuff, perform insane stunts, or just roam free - it's your playground of metal and madness.
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard Controls:
WASD - drive
Space - handbrake
Shift - nitro
Tab - pause
C - camera
R - flip car
K - repair
N - next car
B - slow motion

On mobile devices ‚Äî use on-screen buttons.

games.title: Break Stick Completely
games.description: Dive into the quirky realm of Break Stick Completely, where you unleash mayhem with a stick figure. Use vehicles and obstacles to create comical chaos and rack up points through fun stunts. Accessible on phone and computer, this free game promises endless laughter and enjoyment.
games.howToPlayText:
üéÆ Choose a vehicle ‚Äì from a motorcycle to a supermarket cart!  
üöß Add funny obstacles ‚Äì giant ramps, traps, and much more!
üî• Press ‚ÄúStart‚Äù and watch the crazy stunts Stick performs!
üèÜ Earn points, unlock new levels, and come up with even more experiments!

games.title: Zombie Derby
games.description: Zombie Derby is a wild mix of racing and zombie mayhem from Brinemedia. Jump behind the wheel and plow through hordes of the undead standing in your way. But be careful - your fuel is limited, and once you stop, you‚Äôll become easy prey. Time your nitro boosts wisely, as they might be the only thing that gets you over a hill or across a deadly gap.
games.howToPlayText:
Accelerate - W/Arrow up
Shoot gun - Spacebar
Use nitro - Left Shift/N
Tilt forward/backward - Left/Right arrow or A/D

games.title: Lord of the freaks
games.description:
Main Story

The protagonist finds themselves in a mysterious world called Freakland, where they meet the Worm-helper‚Äôna‚Äîa bizarre creature who reveals a shocking truth: to attain eternal happiness, they must endure a series of trials.
Fight Monsters

Explore the vast reaches of Freakland, battle hordes of monsters, and defeat sinister bosses, absorbing their power. Only then can you establish your dominance in this strange world.
Solve Puzzles

Unravel the secrets of Freakland using your wits and keen observation. Every discovery brings you closer to the truth‚Ä¶
Make Choices

Your decisions shape the hero‚Äôs fate. Which path to take? Should you pick up that mysterious artifact? How will you handle a tough moral dilemma? Every choice affects the story‚Äôs ending.
Upgrade Your Hero

Collect coins to enhance your abilities and discover rare artifacts. And if you‚Äôre lucky‚Äîyou might even gain a familiar, a loyal companion who could one day save your life.
games.howToPlayText:
CONTROL: 

PC Control:

    FORWARD - W ATTACK - LMB        
                                                               
     BACK - ATTACK - RMB        
                                                               
      LEFT - JUMP - SPACEBAR        
                                                           
      RIGHT - D    

Smartphone control:

    Move - left stick

    Jump - jump button

    Attack - Block Button

games.title: Car Destruction King
games.description:
Drive different cars, test your strength with rotating hammers, presses, catapults and other obstacles!
Take part in the races and set new records.
Slow down time for a more realistic crash.
Choose different maps and different game modes!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:
TAB - pause menu (or Escape)

Driving - WASD.
Spacebar - handbrake.
Shift - nitro.
C - change camera.
R - reset car.
K - restore car.
N - switch car.
B - slow motion.

For mobile devices, use the game interface.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/car-destruction-king?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Blasting Marbles
games.description: Blasting Marbles is a thrilling 2D puzzle adventure game where your objective is to strategically place the required number of marbles into the hole. Explore the game world, collecting crates to boost your marble count and discover marbles with unique abilities. Switch between marbles to split their efforts and coordinate teamwork for successful challenges. Immerse yourself in a captivating gameplay experience that combines puzzle, physics, and skill.
games.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to get all the marbles in the level into the hole! The number in the top left of the screen is the amount of marbles that have to get into the hole. To make a marble move, left click near it to create a blast and watch it roll!

There will be boxes in the level - these are extra marbles you can unlock! Have your marble collide into the box to obtain them. The amount of balls in the box are displayed on the box. When you have multiple marbles, you can press the arrow keys or A or D to switch between which marble you want to have in focus.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/blasting-marbles?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Squishy Sheep
games.description:
Your mission is to help an adorable cat friend collect every balloon in each level. All it takes is removing the right platform at just the right moment and letting physics do the magic.

Every level is carefully designed to be solved with just a few clicks, while the sheep bounces across ledges and gathers balloons in delightful, unexpected ways. With fluid animations and a cute, inviting art style, Squishy Sheep keeps you coming back for more until every level is complete.
games.howToPlayText:
Tap (on touchscreen) or click with the left mouse button to remove a platform / obstacle.
Timing is key remove platforms at just the right moment so physics does the rest.
The goal in each level is to help your sheep collect all the balloons by bouncing off ledges and using gravity.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/squishy-sheep?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Flip Gun 3D Ragdoll Shooter
games.description: Experience wild ragdoll physics and hilarious shooting action in Flip Gun 3D Ragdoll Shooter! Unlock weapons, conquer fun challenges, and send ragdolls flying in this addictive, stress-relieving online shooter game.
games.howToPlayText:
Tap to shoot and watch your gun flip as you aim at ragdoll targets

Use flip-based shooting mechanics to hit enemies and trigger hilarious ragdoll reactions

Strategically aim to break obstacles, solve challenges, and cause maximum destruction

Experiment with different weapons for varied flipping and shooting effects

Complete levels by knocking down all targets with limited shots
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/flip-gun-3d-ragdoll-shooter?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Cannon Balls
games.description: Try to be the master of destruction, heat up the buildings neatly and show no mercy! In 'Cannon Balls 3D' it depends on how skillfully you place the shots so that the structures collapse as efficiently as possible. Watch your ammo, because it's limited. But don't worry. There will also come a time when you will bring the cannon to the edge of functionality. Especially when the great bombs are used. So what are you waiting for?
games.howToPlayText:
Aiming & Shooting:
On desktop/browser: Move your mouse to aim the cannon and click the left button to fire.
On mobile: Drag your finger (or stylus) to aim, and tap once to shoot.
Weak Points and TNT:
Target weak spots in the structure (like glass or foundation blocks) to maximize collapse.
Hitting TNT (when present) triggers chain reactions to clear multiple blocks at once.
Bomb Power-Ups:
A bomb meter fills up as you shoot shapes and earn points. When full, tap the bomb icon to switch cannonballs to bombs temporarily.
You‚Äôll normally get only three bombs per level, so use them wisely on tougher structures or large clusters.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/cannon-balls?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Hop To Rescue
games.description: Hop To Rescue is an addictive platformer adventure by NapTech Games where every jump counts! Guide your hero across tricky platforms, dodge enemies, and collect all the bags to unlock the exit door. Each level brings new challenges that test your timing, reflexes, and rescue skills. Play anywhere, anytime, and enjoy smooth platform gameplay designed for endless fun.
games.howToPlayText:
The hero runs automatically and turns around at edges.

Desktop Controls:

‚Üë Up Arrow / Spacebar ‚Üí Jump

Mobile Controls:

Tap screen ‚Üí Jump

Objective: Collect all the bags in the level. Once collected, the door opens.

Reach the door to complete the rescue mission and advance to the next level.

Avoid enemies and traps‚Äîtouching them ends your run!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/hop-to-rescue?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Grand Shift Auto
games.description: Gangster gameplay in the city location.  There are three missions in the game. Take your best guns, rifles, shotgun, machine guns and make chaos in the city. Steal sports cars, ride through the city. Complete missions and try to become rich. Have fun.
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop control:
WASD: - Move
Space: - Jump
Shift: - Run
Left Mouse Click: - Shoot
Middle Mouse: - Change weapon
F: - Enter vehicle
Tab: - Weapon shop
P: - Menu
L: - lock cursor
R: - Restart
C: - Change camera on the car
E: - Light

games.title: StreetRacer: Realistic Destruction
games.description:
Experience the ultimate car destruction mayhem! 

In "StreetRacer: Realistic Destruction", you have complete freedom in a vast open world environment. Wreck cars in spectacular ways ‚Äì watch parts fly off, witness realistic damage, and see wheels go flying in epic crashes.

Key Features:
- Advanced car customization options
- Full exterior customization
- Wheel and suspension tuning
- Destruction tools galore
- Interactive press and ramp areas
- Dynamic traffic simulation
- Realistic damage physics

Explore, destroy, and create your own challenges in this ultimate car destruction playground!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:
WASD - drive
Space - handbrake
Shift - boost
C - change camera
R - reset car
N - new vehicle
K - repair
B - slow motion
Tab - pause

Mobile users: tap on-screen buttons.

Objective: wreck, tune, and explore to your heart's content!

games.title: Buggy Simulator Sandbox 3D
games.description: Buggy Simulator Sandbox 3D is a buggy physics simulator, ride on various maps and observe the behavior of cars and their wheels. There are several cars to choose from - you can switch between them at any time and control any one. Explore the map with the city and the bridge, jump over the hills, drive off the bridge. On the test zone, you can destroy the pyramids, evaluate the work of the suspension and more.
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:
"WASD" - driving/steering
"SPACE" - handbrake
"C" - change camera
"Shift" - nitro
"R" - reset car
"N" - next car
"Tab" - menu
The rest is through the game interface.

For mobile devices, use the game interface.

The goal of the game: just ride as you like ;)

games.title: Space Rovers
games.description: Strap in and get ready to conquer the Red Planet in Space Rovers ‚Äî a physics-based rover builder and cargo delivery game where your engineering skills are the key to survival. Design unique vehicles, transport goods across unforgiving Martian landscapes, and experience the thrill of interplanetary logistics like never before.
games.howToPlayText:
Assemble rovers from a wide selection of wheels and blocks. No two vehicles are the same ‚Äî each build reflects your creativity and problem-solving skills. Whether you favor compact designs or massive cargo haulers, the possibilities are endless.

Desktop Controls:
‚Üë (Up Arrow) / ‚Üí (Right Arrow): Move forward.
‚Üì (Down Arrow) / ‚Üê (Left Arrow): Move backwards.

Mobile Controls:
Left Pedal: Move forward.
Right Pedal: Move backwards.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/space-rovers?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: School Of Basketball
games.description: It is the basketball arcade game in which you must try to score baskets in all the different game modes available. A basketball school opens its doors for enthusiasts like you. Do you know where to aim the ball so that you always hit the basket? Do you know any secret strategies? You have a limited number of balls and every time you miss, you also miss one ball. However, if you never miss, on the contrary, sometimes the ball will be added. How many points will you score?
games.howToPlayText:
Touch and drug anywhere on screen to throw a ball!
You can play either arcade, time attack, and distance mode. Arcade mode gives you 10 balls to use; you must continue to score baskets although it becomes harder each time you score.
Time attack mode requires you to score as many baskets within the time limit as possible; you have unlimited balls but limited time. 
Distance mode allows you to increase the distance of your shot each time that you score. The distance decreases every time you miss a shot, don‚Äôt let the distance reach zero; otherwise, it is game over.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/school-of-basketball?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Eating Simulator The Italian Animals Brainrot
games.description:
Eating Simulator The Italian Animals Brainrot A fun physics puzzle game: feed hungry animals from Italian memes by using gravity, logic, and creativity!

Is a one-of-a-kind physics puzzle game where your mission is to feed adorable and funny animals inspired by Italian memes. Each level challenges your logic, reflexes, and creativity: manipulate objects, control gravity, and build action chains to deliver food straight into the paws or beaks of quirky creatures. The game offers dozens of levels with increasing difficulty, hilarious scenarios, surprising solutions, and signature humor. Attention to detail and precision will be the key to success, while your reward will be the grateful looks of happy, well-fed animals. Dive into a world of carefree fun, where physics is your main tool for playful experiments, and every completed level brings fresh emotions. Test your skills and prove that you can feed every Brainrot animal!
games.howToPlayText: Drag, tap, and build paths! Use blocks and physics to guide food to the animals. Watch out for traps, experiment, and find creative solutions. The goal is simple: make the creatures happy!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/eating-simulator-italian-animal-brainrot?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Parking Boom
games.description:
Parking Boom is a fun and addictive physics-based game where your goal is to launch your car straight into the parking spot!
Adjust the power and angle, smash through other vehicles along the way, and try to land as accurately as possible.

Each level offers unique obstacles and creative challenges that make your ride exciting and unpredictable.
Sharpen your parking skills, beat level after level, and aim for perfection in this fast-paced and explosive adventure.

With a variety of cars, dynamic stages, and tons of destruction, Parking Boom turns every parking attempt into a chaotic thrill ride!
If you're looking for something fresh, loud, and action-packed, Parking Boom will drive you into a world where crashing is half the fun!
games.howToPlayText:
Aim Your Car
Adjust the angle, direction and power using the mouse or touching the screen.

Launch and Crash
Release to launch your car. Smash through other vehicles as you fly toward the parking spot.

Park Accurately
Try to land your car inside the highlighted parking zone.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/parking-boom?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Puppetman: Ragdoll Puzzle
games.description: Dive into the thrilling world of Puppetman: Ragdoll Puzzle, an engaging game that tests your cleverness and quick reactions. Navigate Poly through challenging levels with clever tactics to avoid crashes. With 15 progressively difficult stages, it offers an exciting challenge, whether on mobile or desktop.
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard: Control is carried out by pressing  keys A, S, D .

games.description: Angry Checkers is a thrilling take on the traditional board game, where players try to eliminate opponents‚Äô checkers. This action-packed game delivers engaging and strategic fun for everyone without requiring downloads or sign-ups.

Tap or click one of your checkers and drag it to the direction you want the checker to go. 

You are in full control of the direction and power of your checker move.

games.title: Rolling In Gears
games.description: Rolling In Gears is an engaging puzzle physics platformer game where you control a ball navigating through a series of mechanical challenges. The game‚Äôs main mechanic revolves around rotating gears and moving platforms to guide the ball towards its target destination. Players need to carefully maneuver through the levels, using precision and timing to overcome obstacles and reach the end of each stage.
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop: Use A/D or Left/Right arrow keys to rotate the gears
Mobile: Use the buttons to Rotate Left/Right

games.title: Wood Nuts Master: Screw Puzzle
games.description: Wood Nuts Master: Screw Puzzle is a captivating online game that tests your strategic thinking by fitting screws and nuts to topple wooden blocks. Accessible on multiple platforms, this trending title offers a fun and engaging puzzle experience for those looking for a new play-to-earn option.
games.howToPlayText:
In this physics-based innovative puzzle game, your objective is to strategically place screws and nuts to fall all the wooden blocks.
Think well and find best spots of empty holes to place the screws. Be careful when placing screws as you have limited empty holes and some of which may become covered by the wood blocks you released.

games.howToPlayText:
To protect your villagers from enemies, draw obstacles with your mouse or finger on the screen.

Buy abilities in the store on the main menu to make the game easier.

All features are described in the Hero's Help.

games.title: Billiards 3D: Russian Pyramid
games.description: Play a realistic online billiards game against virtual opponents of varying difficulty. Customize AI skill levels to match your ability and improve your game. Enjoy lifelike tables of different sizes and refine your strategy in this immersive billiards experience!
games.howToPlayText:
- For aiming click anywhere on the table and rotate the cue
- For precise aiming, turn the precision aim wheel on the right side of the screen, or aim the cue while holding down the Shift button if you play on PC
- To hit, click on the cue on the left side of the screen and pull towards the desired force of the blow, then release
- For screws, click on the ball icon with a dot in the upper right part of the screen, move the impact point and confirm the installation of the point by clicking on the green button. If you're playing on a PC, you can hold down the X button on your keyboard while aiming to move the point of impact
- To change the inclination of the cue, click on the cue ball icon at the top of the screen. In this mode, tap anywhere on the screen and raise the cue to the desired angle, then confirm the change by pressing the green button. If you play on a computer, you can hold down the Z button while aiming, this will also change the tilt of the cue.

Enjoy the game! üéÆ
games.howToPlayText:
Use the tools given to you to solve each level. As you progress, the game becomes harder, so use your wits!

Why is Glass Pong the most fun aim and shoot casual game?
Super fun and gets you hooked

games.title: Happy Swing
games.description: Embark on a captivating adventure in Happy Swing, a free online game where timing is your best ally. In this thrilling journey, your mission is to find a lost soul by swinging and jumping with impeccable precision. Every move you make must be calculated, as a single mistake can send you spiraling back. Will you conquer the rhythm and complete your quest? Dive into the gameplay on both your phone and computer for an exhilarating experience!
games.howToPlayText:
üïπÔ∏è Game Controls & Concept üïπÔ∏è

üí° Game Concept:
In this game, the player embarks on a journey to find a lost soul. Timing is everything‚Äîjump and swing at the perfect moment to navigate through the world and reach your goal. Every swing brings you closer, but one wrong move can set you back! Can you master the rhythm and claim the soul?

üéÆ Controls:

üñ•Ô∏è Mouse (PC):
Jump & Swing ‚Äì Click the Mouse Button to jump and grab onto points for swinging.
Perfect Timing ‚Äì Release at the right moment to maintain momentum and progress smoothly.

üì± Mobile:
Jump & Swing ‚Äì Tap the screen to leap and grab onto swing points.
Precision Matters ‚Äì Tap and release with perfect timing to avoid falling!

games.title: Destruction Simulator
games.description:
‚Ä¢ Slow-motion
- You have the full control over the time rate: slow it down, inrease the speed or just stop the simulation

‚Ä¢ Gravity
- Took it all from freezing time‚Ä¶ Well, play with low / high gravity or just turn it off like you are in space ;)

‚Ä¢ Control of gameplay
- Disable or enable explosions visualization (if it covers debris you want to see), only smoke or even lights / flashes.
- Too many debris on the screen? Just enable limitation option so all debris over certain value will smoothly disappear
- Not enough debris? Simply increase destructibility level

‚Ä¢ Guns
- About 13 different explosives (missiles, dynamites, bombs)
- Earthquake, tornado, singularity
- Different sized cannon balls
- Custom gun editor

‚Ä¢ Maps
- Destroy over 30+ prebuild map
- Map editor: Build your own map

‚Ä¢ Simulator
We have created this game for our personal needs - always dreamed of the game that allows you to destroy buildings, but there wasnt any, sooo‚Ä¶ had to do one ourselves : )
games.howToPlayText:
From a computer, press LMB (Left Mouse Button) and swipe across the screen to rotate the camera. Movement on WASD (and QE to raise the camera shutter). The rest is through the game interface.
For mobile use fingers and in-game UI:3

games.title: Golf Invaders
games.description: Welcome to Golf Invaders, the ultimate arcade golf shooter! Your golf course has been invaded by punks, bums, and other troublemakers. Your goal? Aim, shoot, and eliminate all invaders using precision golf shots!
games.howToPlayText:
Welcome to Golf Invaders, the ultimate arcade golf shooter! Your golf course has been invaded by punks, bums, and other troublemakers. Your goal? Aim, shoot, and eliminate all invaders using precision golf shots!

üéØ Aim & Shoot ‚Äì Drag to aim your shot and release to fire the golf ball. Be strategic‚Äîeach level has limited golf balls, so make every shot count!

üí• Use Power Shots ‚Äì Unlock explosive golf balls to deal massive damage and clear multiple invaders at once!

üå¶ Adapt to Weather ‚Äì Wind impact ball physics, making each shot more challenging!

üëæ Defeat Unique Invaders ‚Äì Face off against different enemies, each with their own behaviors.

Play Golf Invaders now and experience the most action-packed golf battle ever! ‚õ≥üî•

games.description: Dive into Zip‚ÄØZap, a beautifully minimalist physics puzzle where simplicity meets ingenuity. In this one-touch adventure, you guide quirky mechanical beings across intricate levels, orchestrating movement with just a tap and a release.
games.howToPlayText:
Tap to contract hinges in your mechanical structure.
Release to activate movement build momentum, tip parts, and react to gravity.
Aim to touch all white circles or reach targeted zones to complete the level and progress.

games.title: Draw & Drop
games.description: Dive into the thrilling universe of Draw & Drop, where creativity and skill collide! Navigate the ball into a basket by sketching your route, while overcoming tricky obstacles. Test your ingenuity through various levels, available for free on both mobile and desktop. Enjoy the challenge!
games.howToPlayText:
-Draw a line where you can direct the ball to the goal

-Click on the ball or the "start" icon in the Top Right to start

-The ball will move along the line you drew.

-The level passes when the ball hits the Target.

games.title: Balls: Ricochet!
games.description:
Balls: Ricochet! - an arcade shooting game. The project pays tribute to the memory of old retro gaming. If you consider yourself a true connoisseur of games, you should play this game and immerse yourself in nostalgia. The game will delight you:
-Authentic gameplay
-Correct ball physics
-Good visual design
The exciting, addictive gameplay will immerse you in the pursuit of the best score for a long time. The concept, developed in the early 80s, still works perfectly. Start playing and beat your friend's score! 
Also pay attention to the following parts of the "Balls", have a nice game!
games.howToPlayText: Your task in the game is to set the direction of the ball. The ball destroys blocks using the environment of the level, you can set the direction of the ball so that it ricochets off the walls and blocks, so in one shot you can knock out several blocks at once.

games.title: Spill & Knock Down
games.description: In Spill It!, you drop balls in order to knock over glasses and spill everything inside them. It combines simple mechanics with physics-based puzzles‚Äîto achieve the goal you must carefully aim, drop, and use gravity / momentum to spill from glasses.
games.howToPlayText:
You get to drop balls from certain positions.
You can aim or choose the drop point in many cases.
The balls interact with the environment: glassware, supports, possibly moving platforms or obstacles.
Physics matters: timing, angle, force, obstacle clearance.

Your goal is to spill all the liquid from the glasses. You do this by using the balls: drop, throw or position them so that they hit the glasses (directly or via bouncing or rollovers) and cause the liquid inside to spill out.

games.description:
Welcome to the fun world of Cannon Strike, an arcade game where you shoot balls from a cannon! It's very easy to play.
So, are you ready to aim and fire? Download Cannon Strike Ball now and start playing! Challenge yourself to see how many levels you can pass! 
Get the game today and have a blast shooting cannonballs!
games.howToPlayText:
To finish a level, you need to fill all the buckets with balls. ü™£
Drop the right number of balls into each bucket to move to the next level. Watch out for moving obstacles that can block your shots!
In Cannon Strike, aim and shoot as many cannonballs as you can into the basket. It's a game that tests your aiming skills with a bit of physics fun!

games.title: Bridge Builder
games.description:
Become a design engineer who will have to improvise and, above all, adapt to the task at hand. Use different materials to build structures that can support the weight of the vehicle.

Game Features:

- Excellent physics - a real simulator
- Challenging levels in four different locations
- Challenging puzzles requiring the use of thinking and logic
- Built-in hint system will help you develop your skills
games.howToPlayText:

Drag left click = build a bridge
Space = start simulation
Z = undo

Mobile controls:
Use touchscreen and on-screen controls

games.title: Happy Glass - Draw to Fill
games.description: Happy Glass: Draw to Fill is a creative and relaxing puzzle game where your goal is to fill a happy glass with water ‚Äî but there's a twist! You must draw lines and shapes to guide the water flow into the glass. Think strategically, draw creatively, and use physics to your advantage as you solve increasingly challenging levels. The game features colorful visuals, satisfying animations, and a joyful glass that smiles only when full. Whether you're a fan of brain teasers or just love doodling your way through clever puzzles, this game is sure to entertain and test your ingenuity.
games.howToPlayText: Use your finger or mouse to draw lines or shapes on the screen. These drawings will act as paths, ramps, or barriers to guide the water into the glass. The goal is to fill the glass above the dashed line without spilling too much water. Think carefully and use your imagination to solve each level ‚Äî and don‚Äôt forget, the glass only smiles when it‚Äôs full!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/happy-glass--draw-to-fill?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: TENKYU BALL
games.description: TENKYU BALL is a 3D casual ball-rolling puzzle game where you must guide a ball through tilting stages to reach the goal. The environment is minimalistic, and the challenge comes from balancing control vs risk. As you tilt the stage more, the ball moves faster, but there‚Äôs danger: if you tilt too much, the ball may fall off and you'll fail the level.
games.howToPlayText:
Tilt the stage / swipe finger:
You swipe (or drag) on your screen to tilt the surface on which the ball rests.
The tilt direction determines where the ball rolls.
Control carefully:
If you tilt too much, the ball gains speed and can fall off the edge.
Tilt only as much as needed to navigate turns, avoid gaps, and make tricky maneuvers.
Reach the goal:
Each stage has a goal point or exit you must reach. Successfully get the ball there without falling off.
Failure and retry:
If the ball falls, the level ends (you lose) and you‚Äôll need to restart that stage.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/tenkyu-ball?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>
